text: Llywelyn the Last (1223 - 11 December 1282) was Prince of Wales from 1246 until 1282. == Battle of Orewin Bridge (1282) == In 1282, near the town of Builth Wells, the Kingdom of Wales fought a battle against the English, in which Llywelyn was killed. Category:Princes and Princesses of Wales Category:1223 births Category:1282 deaths
title: Llywelyn the Last
